content.raw:
for the gzbridge build errors, there was a change in the latest gazebo version that broke the build. The gazebo pkg-config cflags and ldflags are incorrect. I've ticketed a [gazebo issue #1259](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/1259/problem-compiling-against-gazebo-using-pkg). 

Until that's fixed, we'll have to find a workaround to make gzweb build. One manual way for now is to find the gazebo.pc file (e.g. /usr/lib/pkgconfig)

- under `CFlags:` remove `;/usr/include`

- under `Libs:` remove `-l` in front of the libsdformat.so

I'll see if there's a better way around this
